entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Germany is very proactive with tracing Covid19 cases ! They even have a corona warn app to let you know if you been around someone with Covid19 ! What are Republicans doing other than trying to cash in on the pandemic ? We need an app like this !!! https://t.co/ToIPiIxzoN
